au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.name: L1=4m_L2=3m_apx10_20160607
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.initScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(300) # Drive detector to short position driveDet(2200,0) # Drive entrance aperture to 50 mm square driveEntRotAp(180) # Drive guide to g7 driveGuide(guideConfig.g7) # Drive entrance aperture to 180 (for guide g4) driveEntRotAp(180) #set sample ap to 10 mm sics.drive('apx', -72) # Drive beamstops up selBs(1) # set beamcentres sics.set('beamcenterx', 94.2807) sics.set('beamcenterz', 95.4274)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.preTransmissionScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(41, 100) # Drive attenuator to 300 driveAtt(300)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.preScatteringScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(41, 0) driveBsz(262)
